devices.name: One
devices.description: Thuraya One Android smartphone. Announced Jan 2025. Features 6.67″ display, QCM4490 chipset, 3500 mAh battery, 128 GB storage, 6 GB RAM, Corning Gorilla Glass 5.

devices.name: SG-2520
devices.description: Thuraya SG-2520 smartphone. Announced Mar 2007. Features 1.9″ display, 1.3 MP primary camera, 1280 mAh battery, 128 MB storage.
